org.deeplearning4j.spark.api

Interface TrainingWorker<R extends TrainingResult>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseTrainingWorker, ParameterAveragingTrainingWorker, SharedTrainingWorker

    public interface TrainingWorker<R extends TrainingResult>
extends java.io.Serializable
    TrainingWorker is a small serializable class that can be passed (in serialized form) to each Spark executor for actually conducting training. The results are then passed back to the TrainingMaster for processing.

    TrainingWorker implementations provide a layer of abstraction for network learning tha should allow for more flexibility/ control over how learning is conducted (including for example asynchronous communication)

      • processMinibatch

        R processMinibatch(DataSet dataSet,
                   MultiLayerNetwork network,
                   boolean isLast)
        Process (fit) a minibatch for a MultiLayerNetwork
        Parameters:
        dataSet - Data set to train on
        network - Network to train
        isLast - If true: last data set currently available. If false: more data sets will be processed for this executor
        Returns:
        Null, or a training result if training should be terminated immediately.
